title: THE WINNER OF WORLDS HAS TO FIGHT 4 YASOU DOOMBOTS AND AN ALLISTAR.
body:
Title says it all.

Make it happen.

replies.body: What level of hell did you come from?
{{champion:17}} the 7th circle naturally.
Riot: The 666th circle.

there are only 9 circles smfh the last 2 are frozen, gosh, read a book man!

Kappa no Kappa
its in riots lore, says to in iverns champ reveal page (specifically his weakness to teemo)
I didn't see Dante coming
9*222/3=666 so just repeat the same process multiple times
Dumb. I'd rather watch a Soraka all for one game.

Well so you know

That's offensive.
http://img.memecdn.com/feel-free-to-get-the-fuck-out_o_828989.jpg
Bloody legend M8.
Best response 2016! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Soraka all for ones are fun lol, no one deals damage so they have to get creative with split pushing and coordinate their Es, or make a protect the soraka comp with 1 AD soraka

No one deals damage?
Guess I got nuked by minions, then.
https://encrypted-tbn3.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRa1xhuV9kmuF6c1dvrsw1Jee91FascrwzVa_-ewuwSbjA0nR5TKA
What about three Yasuo and two Alistar?

No one has yet defined Doombot Yasuo mechanics: 

* Q: Is now a passive: All basic attacks are now targetted Q's.
* Empowered Steel Tempest: 
 * On every cast, spawns a Janna. AD buffs from the shields of multiple Jannas stack. 
 * On every cast, two dollars and ninety five cents is mysteriously deducted from your bank account by an anonymous source with the transaction note, "HASAGI!"
* Windwall: Now spawns Anivias.
* Sweeping Blade: Can now be cast on towers, ducklings, poros, your basic attack animations, and each drop of sweat that appears on your forehead as you cower in fear.
* Last Breath: Spawns an ulting wukong.
Please no, the current Yasuo Doombot is scary enough, NotLikeThis.

Wait, what? Is even its doombot is the most OP?

edit: I mean - what are its abilities?
Anytime someone gets knocked up anywhere on the map, a ghost of yasuo ults them
Holly...

The most OP doombot is Malzahar, who can solo push a lane to inhib in about a minute and can summon Rift Herald that doesn't even drop it's buff.  At least Udyr, who can bring in jungle creeps to push, allows the creeps to give their buffs.
Not joking, the fact that they added yasuo (and sometimes lots of windwalls even if he's not in the game) tilts me so hard.

*picks morgana*

GGEZ MOTHERFAKER

The Yasuo bot isn't even the worst. The Bots don't buy things or heal until they die, meaning Yasuo doesn't eveneed become that much of a nuisance. The WORST Doom Bot by far is Amumu, who's W makes all of his nearby minions and pets emit the aura as well, meaning you can't approach him. Then, there's his ult, which is massive, about the size of the dragon pit out to the bot side of the river.

{{champion:157}} mid
{{champion:57}} top
{{champion:12}} bot
{{champion:429}} bot
{{champion:131}} jung
what does the yasuo doombot do?
I think if Faker is equipped with Dyrus's pillow for maximum skill, we should see him solo that and win.
It has to be Mata's Alistar too...
Doombot Ivern- makes entire map burning bushes, doesn't technically kill anyone.....still wins
I want to see them put the pre-rework Sion in doombots.  Have him come out of random bushes with his shield then q, blow up his shield, and run away.
And only one member of the winning team. Blindfolded... AND they have to return the trophy if they lose.

{{champion:2}} {{champion:41}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:420}} {{champion:78}} 

Easy enough.
you better make that Alistar in urf mode
I say yes
I heard Faker did this already after he won worlds.
